location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 42 TO ILLUSTRATE THE OPERATIONS AT BAKU. AUGUST-SEPTEMBER, 1918.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 344 x 332mm, on sheet 395 x 285mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a region around Baku in the eastern Caucasus Region, indicating built-up areas, settlements, routes, railways, seas and lakes. Relief is shown with form lines.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
